metadata.title: Psycho Bunny Mens Knit Boxer Briefs
features: Made in the USA or Imported
The Psycho Bunny Cotton Modal Boxer Briefs have the snug, breathable support for cozy casual days. Pull on underwear with logo elastic waistband and screened logo design at left side.
description: The first thing you put on in the morning should set the tone for your day. That's why our mens knit boxer briefs are crafted to our lofty standards. Made from a cotton-modal-elastane blend, our knit boxer briefs feature an elastic waistband, for a foolproof fit that won't change during the day. The waistband features woven Psycho Bunny branding on the front. With their snug fit, subtle stretch and soft on-body feel, our boxer briefs offer the perfect blend of confidence and comfort. These aren't your typical boxer briefs, they're the most comfortable you'll ever wear.
